name: Pebbles Bed and Breakfast by the Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our second stay and it was better than the first one and that was hard to top! We had five nights this time and we stayed in the Lighthouse room again with lovely views of the beach. Rosemary and Humfrey were amazing hosts and good fun. Breakfast is amazing, everything is so fresh and tasty. It sets you up for the day ahead. Sadly they are retiring from Pebbles but a couple who have stayed there before are taking over in February. We have already book for October next year. Hopefully it won't have changed under the new people.
reviews.title: This is such an excellent B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thanks very much, Rosemary and Hunfrey, and we wish you all the best for the future.
reviews.title: Amazing B and B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pebbles bed and breakfast is right in the town but when you get inside it s like another world! Beautifully furnished, peaceful atmosphere, very large bedroom with enclosed balcony and stunning views of the sea. King size luxurious and comfy bed. Homemade cake, a wonderful breakfast and a homemade gift in the room instead of packet biscuits. A bit more than we would normally spend but worth every penny.
reviews.title: Peaceful stay at Pebbles.

reviews.text: Stayed 4 nights at Pebbles, and it was delightful. We had The Lighthouse Room which was extremely comfortable and with a lovely view of the beach and sea. It was very peaceful sitting in the rooms's conservatory watching the sea.Humphrey and Rosemary were very friendly and helpful. Breakfasts were very nice with an excellent choice. We had a very enjoyable stay, and would highly recommend this guest house.
reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here with my partner and my son. We had the Sail Loft and Beach Hut. Both gorgeous rooms, the decor was stunning and I kept saying I wanted my own room to look just the same!!!!
reviews.title: Deserved 5 Star status

description: BED AND BREAKFAST BY THE BEACH!! Set just a few feet from the famous beach at Budleigh Salterton with panoramic East Devon sea and coastal views from each of the bedrooms. Lulled to sleep by the sound of the sea, stunning sea views while eating your breakfast, Pebbles really is 'Bed and Breakfast by the Beach!'
